title: Strange channel issue: two receivers with closed channel, only one wakes up
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

With reference to:

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-dev/browse_thread/thread/c90fcbeeb0b2cd9f

tar -zxvf bork.tar.gz
cd bork
./run.sh

What is the expected output?

Program should work.

What do you see instead?

Program runs to completion many times, but deadlocks sometimes if GOMAXPROCS>1.

I've included the stdout and stderr after applying the patch in CL 4128053.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

tip

Please provide any additional information below.

This code also triggers issue #1479 from time to time.
Attachments: 1. bork.tar.gz (9530 bytes) 1. out (50441 bytes) 1. err (68949 bytes)
